website_summaries.verdict: The exercise-focused JBL Endurance Run earphones sound better than you'd expect from a sub-$20 pair, wired or not.
pros: Powerful audio performance with deep bass and crisp highs
Can be worn in two different ways

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: After having some problems with JBL wired headphones and sick of having my batery drained by Bluetooth headphones. This JBL earbud is durable, has a very good noise cancelling, and reasonable bass sound. I’ve been using for 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mateus Falcão

customer_reviews.title: Durable, great sound
customer_reviews.text: Was so sick of getting cheap ear buds that kept breaking or unraveling. I tried these and they are nearly indestructible. Great sound, and good for conference calls. I bought two pair and unless I lose them, I have no doubt they will last for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Dedicated Amazonist

customer_reviews.title: Not as sweatproof as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.text: I had fallen in love with Yurbuds as they stayed in my ears like no other earbuds. Mine failed, and this seemed like the closest replacement from JBL. On the plus side, they do stay in well. Unfortunately within a couple of months, the left earbud has already gone dead. I assume it was from sweat, but I don't know for sure. They weren't expensive, so I didn't expect much, and I didn't get much. If you're just using it for commuting or listening at home or in the office, they might be okay.
customer_reviews.author: J. Arendt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phones in the 20 dollar range
customer_reviews.text: I'm typically sensitive to earbud-type headphones, but these are great. They sound awesome, and they don't fall out of my ears when I'm at the gym. I'd buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: No, these headphones don't fall out!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many headphones that "have great sound quality" and "stay in while running" - all with disappointing results. Sound quality is generally mediocre and most fall out of my ears. I love these headphones! Sound quality is excellent, and they didn't fall out once while exercising over the past few days. Great price as well. I recommend these to all of those people who are constantly pushing their headphones back in while running.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: JBL End Run
customer_reviews.text: I use these ear headphones for the gym and hiking on my ipod. They work as they should for the price. Only issue is that the cord can sometimes curl up but all wired earphones do that.
customer_reviews.author: Richie Ben

customer_reviews.title: Average. Loud cord
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special. The cord makes super load sounds. But if you wear them upside down that goes away. The sound is solid but nothing to write home about.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING HEADPHONES!!!
customer_reviews.text: O...M...G... I am in love...I always have trouble with earphones that will not stay in my ears! These earphones are AMAZING! great sound quality...and they fit and STAY in my ears AND...the headphones are magnetic, how's that for nice? Did I mention that the sound is AMAZING!!! I LOVE THEM! No complaints at all other then they are never in stock to by an extra!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Best Wired Headphones I Own
customer_reviews.text: Love these Headphones, I actually lost my pair so I switched to some regular ones and I could really tell the difference. They fit to your ear provide great sound quality and the added sweatproof protection just means perfect for the gym. Planning on ordering these again.
customer_reviews.author: M. A.

customer_reviews.title: Magnets are awesome. Survivability not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Love the magnets. This is the main reason I buy these and only these earbuds. It makes it super easy and convenient to have one earbud in one out without a dangling cord getting caught everywhere. I just wish they had more "endurance" straight out of the box. They break quickly and are even sometimes static-y brand new. But I've owned 5 pairs for a reason and have another 4 stockpiled for when my newest breaks.
customer_reviews.author: chris olson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent earbuds. I love the JBL brand. Previously had beats but they seem to fail after heavy use within a year of having them. These seem to be able to withstand daily use with no issues. This pair was purchased for my husband bc I love the pair I have and I have had mine 2 years with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Blake

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought the most expensive headphones and they had nothing on these jbl headphones they are amazing u will not regret your purchase
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Very snug. Feels sturdy. So far so good. Wish it had a volume buttons like all the other earbuds
customer_reviews.author: InvaderZEM

customer_reviews.title: Not for gym use
customer_reviews.text: JBL is the best and the sound quality is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Arshed

customer_reviews.title: I like 'em...
customer_reviews.text: Good sound. I use it for the gym and it does cancel noise. When I start to sweat, the right earbud will slip a bit but a slight push in is no hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Kay-Bee

customer_reviews.title: Work fine!
customer_reviews.text: For my needs these are just fine. They are well made and fit snug in ear. I use them at work and have no real issues.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amaaaaaaazing. These are so good and only 20$?! I'm losing my mind. So good.
customer_reviews.author: VeronicaB.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted over the ear headphones however I ended up using these the regular way. At first, I was disappointed that the over the ear was uncomfortable but the multi-usage helps me enjoy it more. overall sound quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amparo

customer_reviews.title: great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of headphones for the price. Very, very, happy with product. Super fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these- and the price was incredibly reasonable
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Very bad thumping noise when moving
customer_reviews.text: When running or otherwise being active the earbuds produce an incredibly loud and obnoxious thumping noise as the cord bounces around. This sound can even drown out the music you are playing completely defeating the point of these earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are some good headphones for a good price sound quality is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: I would buy another pair or 2
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this for when I’m not moving around a lot but I fell in love with these I would definitely buy another pair
customer_reviews.author: Nathan thomas

customer_reviews.title: They're good headphones
customer_reviews.text: They are excellent headphones, sound quality is absolutely great. The only problem is that one side working after a couple of months
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is an upgrade from what I have been using, and these were half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Elwell

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had these earbuds for about a month and they work great. Sound quality is good,
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Flexible fit is bogus
customer_reviews.text: The flexible fit is really loose and doesn’t actually fit. Besides that I have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Grace M

customer_reviews.title: Stays in ear well
customer_reviews.text: Stay in the ear. Sound is pretty pretty pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Amir Steinhauer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This was the best $20 I have ever spent on earbuds. These JBL earbuds have excellent sound quality and awesome base, mid range and highs. You can everything so crisp and clean, I am very impressed and happy with this purchase. I strongly recommend that anyone looking for good earbuds, look no further because you just found them.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this ear buds 5 days ago and now I'm ordering some for my sister this headphones sound good clear with a littls bit of bass that's how I love my headphones not too much bass plus they are durable I hope jbl never stops selling them thanks jbl keep making product like this
customer_reviews.author: djphantac

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Good Fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the price. I don't run much, so I cannot attest to how well they will fit you (they come with three different size ear canal tips) or if they will fall out during your sweaty busy activity but they grip my ear canals very well, and provide a very good level of isolation, on par with professional IEM ear buds from SHURE (E2) I've used. I use JBL products often in my professional live sound work so I tried these out and they are the level of quality I expect from JBL. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Don S.

customer_reviews.title: Mic button inadvertently activates
customer_reviews.text: Only had them for a few weeks and for some reason whether plugged into my iPhone or iPad the button next to the mic started inadvertently activating all the time so Siri would pause the music and ask me to repeat what I’m searching for. These were awesome headphones until that started happening now they’re basically useless because they do that all the time. Bought them at store while traveling so can’t take them back so I’m stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lundholm

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe these are $20. They feel and sound like a much more expensive pair. Wish the remote was 3-button for Android so I could control volume from it but definitely not a deal breaker considering the strengths of these earbuds. Magnetic backs keep from tangling. Mic seems to work flawlessly so far. Very comfortable and the twist lock feature does seem like it would work well, but I haven't tried running with them yet. Overall, very happy with my purchase as always with JBL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality that doesn't fall from your ear.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is nice but my only main concern is always falling every time I wear it at the gym. Or working out. It's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Earl Arnuco

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The sound went out in one ear in less than 1 years’ time. Junk
customer_reviews.author: Lori Sunderman

customer_reviews.title: its sounds good
customer_reviews.text: this was great low price and it sounds really good for a good price you should buy it
customer_reviews.author: pacifique

customer_reviews.title: Great results for a very affordable price
customer_reviews.text: My gym headphones went out on me and I gave these a quick chance. Great results for a very affordable price. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri S

product_meta.title: JBL Endurance RUN Sweatproof Sports In-Ear Headphones with One-Button Remote and Microphone (Black)
product_meta.description: You will Receive 1 JBL Endurance Run - Sport Wireless In Ear HCL (Black) In ear, wired headphone with microphone and one button control
feature_bullets: You will Receive 1 JBL Endurance Run - Sport Wireless In Ear HCL (Black)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars121 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
